Sentencas: In order to gain insight into the mechanism causing performance degradation and/or failure, stacks of planar solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) are routinely dismantled and examined after operation at Forschungszentrum Julich.
Titulo: Chemical interaction between glass-ceramic sealants and interconnect steels in SOFC stacks

Sentencas: The post-operation inspection focuses in particular on the chemical and mechanical compatibility aspects of cell and stack materials.
Titulo: Chemical interaction between glass-ceramic sealants and interconnect steels in SOFC stacks

Sentencas: In the present work a short-term degradation effect is addressed, which was found to be caused by unwanted chemical interactions between glass-ceramic sealants and ferritic steel interconnects.
Titulo: Chemical interaction between glass-ceramic sealants and interconnect steels in SOFC stacks

Sentencas: The post-operation inspection revealed severe steel corrosion along the seal rims.
Titulo: Chemical interaction between glass-ceramic sealants and interconnect steels in SOFC stacks

Sentencas: Under SOFC stack conditions rapidly growing oxide nodules were observed bridging the 200 mu m seal gal) between the metallic components after a few hundred hours of operation.
Titulo: Chemical interaction between glass-ceramic sealants and interconnect steels in SOFC stacks

Sentencas: These oxide nodules, rich in iron, gave rise to local short-circuiting effects eventually resulting in stack failure.
Titulo: Chemical interaction between glass-ceramic sealants and interconnect steels in SOFC stacks

Sentencas: The present study, combined with recent model investigations triggered by the stack results, indicates that severe degradation only occurs in the case of glass-ceramic sealants which contain minor amounts of PbO. Furthermore, the rate of corrosion attack of the metallic components strongly depends on the silicon (Si) content of the ferritic steel.
Titulo: Chemical interaction between glass-ceramic sealants and interconnect steels in SOFC stacks

Sentencas: The stack tests suggest that increasing the Si content increases the corrosion rate, and thus detrimentally influences the stack performance.
Titulo: Chemical interaction between glass-ceramic sealants and interconnect steels in SOFC stacks
